string.value: May was right. When you went into the City Center, you found another survivor, Bao. Bao could not move an inch because he was so afraid of Iruvatas and asked that you help him. He appears to be a big guy, but really, he's just a softie inside.
You defeated Iruvatas that were scaring Bao. Bao thanked you for your help. What a softie.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 90,000\r\nCan participate in the "The Wreckage of the Missile" quest.\r\n

Quiet! Keep it down. This place is filled with Iruvatas. Don't you see them? Iruvatas are androids that resemble female warriors. The are made to attack, so they're extremely dangerous. I don't know who you are, but could you please eliminate the Iruvatas?
Wow, you're a brave one, aren't you? Then please eliminate 50 Iruvatas. Woohoo! I'll be rooting for you.
I know. Anyone would be scared. They are, like I said, extremely dangerous.
I was cheering for you from here. That was incredible! But first things first. Am I the only survivor?\r\n#b#L0#There is a lady named May not too far from here.#l\n#k
Oh... Really? Then I should suck it up and go over there. Thank you so much for your help.
Please eliminate 50 Iruvatas. Please be careful. I'm telling you. They're extremely dangerous.
Please eliminate 50 Iruvatas. Please be careful. I'm telling you. They're extremely dangerous.
Please eliminate 50 Iruvatas. Please be careful. I'm telling you. They're extremely dangerous.
